attributes.action: More trains at least part of the solution!
attributes.additional_details:
With the current over-crowding on Britain's rail Network it's about time we built more Trains!

With each complaint to TOC's the same answer is always given, there are no more carriages available. Between major cities companies are running two carriage trains, leaving people behind even off-peak.

In short:
- Build more trains, or encourage them to be built
- Run more than two carriages between key cities, this may even taken away the need for HS2
